Header.title: Advance Engineering Classes
Header.paragraph: Mastering the Future: Elevate Your Engineering Skills with Advanced Classes

About.paragraph: At Advance Engineering Classes, we're dedicated to shaping the future of engineering excellence. Our comprehensive curriculum and expert faculty empower students to master cutting-edge technologies and innovative methodologies. Whether you're a seasoned professional or a budding engineer, our advanced classes offer a gateway to unlocking your full potential and staying ahead in today's dynamic industry landscape.
Why: Expert Guidance: Benefit from the expertise of our renowned faculty members who bring years of industry experience to the classroom.
Hands-On Learning: Apply theoretical knowledge to real-world situations through practical projects.
Personalized Attention: Benefit from small class sizes and dedicated instructors for individualized support.
Cutting-Edge Curriculum: Stay updated with our constantly evolving curriculum reflecting the latest engineering advancements.
Why2: Career Preparation: Our programs ensure readiness for future career paths, be it further education or entry into the workforce.
Networking Opportunities: Connect with professionals and peers through various events and workshops.
Flexibility: We offer flexible scheduling options to accommodate busy lifestyles, allowing you to balance your education with other commitments.
Supportive Community: Join a supportive community of like-minded individuals who share your passion for engineering and are committed to helping each other succeed.

Courses.name: 1'st Year Engineering
Courses.text: Engineering mechanics(EM), Engineering drawings/ graphic (ED),Basic of electronics Basic Electrical Engineering (BEE), Maths-1, Maths-2.

Courses.name: 2'nd Year Engineering
Courses.text: Maths-3, Maths-4, Electrical network/ circuit theory/ network theory (EN/NT/CTN), Control system (CS), Digital logic design/ digital system design/ digital circuits design (DSD/ DLDA/DCD/LD), Electronics circuit design (EDC/ADC/ED), Signal and system (SS), Linear integrated circuit/ Integrated circuit (LIC/DLIC/IC).

Courses.name: 3'rd Year Engineering
Courses.text: Electromagnetics (EME),Digital signal processing/ discrete time signal processing (DSP/DTSP),Signal processing (SP) ,Very large scale integrated circuit (VLSI)

Testimonials.name: Sagar Thorat
Testimonials.snippet: I'm delighted to share my positive experience for this engineering coaching classes. Siddharth Sir is very knowledgeable, patient, and creates a supportive learning environment. The lessons are well-structured, making complex concepts easy to grasp. I highly recommend this coaching center for anyone seeking quality engineering education. Not only is he a great instructor but also a great advisor helping students shape their careers in a positive direction.

Testimonials.name: Vaibhav Tyagi
Testimonials.snippet: I highly recommend taking engineering classes with Siddharth sir. He provides excellent coaching and takes great care of his students. His knowledge and expertise in the field contribute to a positive and enriching learning experience.

Testimonials.name: Ajay Wavhal
Testimonials.snippet: It's been 8 years since I have learned from Siddharth Sir, he is still in touch and guiding me through every academic and career aspect of life as a mentor. He is really good in important subjects like Maths, Mechanics, Engineering Drawing, and BEEE. Thank you Siddharth Sir✌️

Testimonials.name: Sami Ahmed
Testimonials.snippet: Siddharth sir is a life saver for Engineering students. His teaching methods encourage students to get out of the comfort zone and stay active in the competition.

Testimonials.name: # rushi7_14
Testimonials.snippet: Siddharth sir is the best! He cleared all my golden KT's and remaining SE KT's. The overall environment in class is also good if you want to score must join advance classes !! Best

Testimonials.name: Atharva Kotkar
Testimonials.snippet: Highly recommended for engineering students. Siddharth sir is an electronic god. Once he teaches you are Pro in it.

Testimonials.name: Shubham Dalvi
Testimonials.snippet: I’ve personally known prof Siddharth and he’s a wonderful tutor. I highly recommend his coaching.

Testimonials.name: SWATI MOHITE
Testimonials.snippet: Joined this class to improve my grades in Engineering, not only I got a better result but cleared my doubts and enjoyed learning here. Siddharth Sir is one of the amazing teachers I met in my life. Highly suggested for first-year engineering.

Testimonials.name: Simran Madaan
Testimonials.snippet: The best engineering classes in Navi Mumbai. Trust me teachers for here will make all engineering semesters super easy. No chance of getting any KT. Without thinking twice join the classes.

Contact.address: Om Sai Datta Niwas, Plot No. A/32, 3rd Floor, A Wing Room No. 307, Sector-20, Opp. Nerul Rly Station (W) Beside SBI Bank Nerul Navi Mumbai-400706

Features.title: Experienced Faculty
Features.text: Our faculty brings extensive industry knowledge and expertise to the classroom, ensuring academic excellence. Learn from the best and gain invaluable insights to shape your engineering journey.

Features.title: Small Batch Size
Features.text: Experience personalized attention with our small batch sizes. Each student receives individualized support, fostering a conducive learning environment where questions are encouraged and no one gets left behind.

Features.title: Personal Mentorship
Features.text: Unlock your potential with our personalized mentorship program. Our dedicated mentors offer tailored guidance and support every step of the way, helping you thrive in both career and academia.

Features.title: Student Improvement
Features.text: Our comprehensive education approach focuses on your growth and development. Through innovative teaching methods and continuous feedback, we empower you to achieve academic success and realize your goals.
